special_notes: Har Ghar Tiranga campaign under Azadi Ka Amrit Mahotsav will be celebrated from 2nd to 15th August 2025. All faculty, staff, and students are encouraged to hoist the Indian National Flag and upload selfies on www.harghartiranga.com.
